 <form name="submit-to-google-sheet">
  <input name="email" type="email" placeholder="訂閱最新消息請留email" required>
  <button type="submit">送出</button>
  
  <input name="name" type="name" placeholder="Name" required> <button type="submit">送出</button>
  
  

</form>



<script>
  const scriptURL = 'https://script.google.com/macros/s/AKfycbx5ksHejLgUuji43G1NEm3VhmNUIiv25-Bq-Pp81iJClNIESWM/exec'
  const form = document.forms['submit-to-google-sheet']
  form.addEventListener('submit', e => {
    e.preventDefault()
    fetch(scriptURL, { method: 'POST', body: new FormData(form)})
      .then(response => console.log('Success!', response))
      .catch(error => console.error('Error!', error.message))
  })
</script>
